actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

official_title: To require the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to carry out a joint study of the impact of certain proposed rules on trading and capital markets activities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Capital Markets Impact of Federal Reserve Study Act

titles.title: Capital Markets Impact of Federal Reserve Study Act
Capital Markets Impact of Federal Reserve Study Act

To require the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to carry out a joint study of the impact of certain proposed rules on trading and capital markets activities, and for other purposes.
